name: iSkate
description:
iSkate lets you watch and share awesome videos with other skateboarders!

It connects Skateboarders from all around the world to challenge each other. It's an app made for skaters by skaters!

Who am I?

My name is Abdulrahman AlZanki, I'm a 17 year old iPhone developer from Kuwait. I also happen to be a skater/rider. I started developing iPhone games two years ago. My most successful app "Doodle Destroy" was downloaded more than one million times! It was featured on CNN and New York Times. I've been passionate about extreme sports for 4 years.
